snippet: A group of music publishers has sued Fullscreen, a leading supplier of videos to YouTube, saying that many of its videos infringe on their copyrights.
abstract: Group of music publishers sues Fullscreen, one of largest suppliers of videos to YouTube, saying that many of so-called multichannel network's videos infringe on publishers' copyrights.
lead_paragraph: A group of music publishers has sued Fullscreen, a leading supplier of videos to YouTube, saying that many of its videos infringe on their copyrights.

headline.main: Copyright Lawsuit Targets Cover Songs on YouTube
